naslov: *** Vila iznad Splita s panoramskim pogledom, 335 m2 *** (prodaja)
opis: Villa na Klisu iznad Splita, s prekrasnim panoramskim pogledom. Villa je položena na parceli površine 1150 m2, nudi iznimnu privatnost i intimu. Smještena je u lijepo uređenom prostranom vrtu bogatom mediteranskim biljkama i prostranim sunčanim terasama. Vila ima vanjski bazen smješten u samom centru vrta uz koji je i tradicionalna konoba u dalmatinskom stilu. Vila je smještena na tri etaže - prizemlje, prvi i drugi kat. Sastoji se od četiri spavaće sobe, kuhinje, blagovaonice, dnevnog boravka, dvije kupaonice, jedan WC, bazen - 32 m2, konoba, igraonica - 100 m2 osobnog parkirališta za 4 automobila. Na prvom katu se nalazi prostrani stan koji se sastoji od kuhinje, blagovaonice, dnevnog boravka, hodnika i toalete, terase od 100 m2. Vila je u potpunosti klimatizirana i opremljena modernim namještajem te najsuvremenijom tehnologijom LCD TV-a, DVD-a i Wi-Fi-jem. Na drugom katu nalaze se četiri spavaće sobe koje su opremljene s bračnim krevetima, velikom kupaonicom, dnevnim boravkom i velikom terasom na južnoj strani. U prizemlju se nalaze konoba i igraonica s barom, stolom za biljar, pikadom i stolnim tenisom. Prednost vile osim mirnog i intimnog okruženja je i panoramski pogled koji se pruža sa svake terase i iz svake prostorije. Vlasništvo 1/1, te ostala uredna dokumentacija. Za sve detaljnije informacije molimo obratite se agenciji. 21stCENTURY - profesionalan pristup & provjerene nekretnine NAPOMENA: Agencijska provizija za kupca: 3% *** Villa above Split with panoramic views, 335m2 *** Villa on Klis above Split, with a beautiful panoramic view. The villa is located on a plot of 1150 m2, offers exceptional privacy and intimacy. It is set in a beautifully landscaped spacious garden rich in Mediterranean plants and spacious sun terraces. The villa has an outdoor pool located in the center of the garden next to which is a traditional tavern in the Dalmatian style. The villa is located on three floors - ground floor, first and second floor. It consists of four bedrooms, kitchen, dining room, living room, two bathrooms, one toilet, swimming pool - 32 m2, tavern, playroom - 100 m2 of private parking for 4 cars. On the first floor there is a spacious apartment with a kitchen, dining room, living room, hallway and toilet, terrace of 100 m2. The villa is fully air conditioned and equipped with modern furniture and the latest technology of LCD TV, DVD and Wi-Fi. On the second floor there are four bedrooms which are equipped with double beds, a large bathroom, a living room and a large terrace on the south side. On the ground floor there is a tavern and a games room with a bar, billiard table, darts and table tennis. The advantage of the villa, in addition to a quiet and intimate environment, is the panoramic view that extends from each terrace and from each room. Ownership 1/1, and other proper documentation.
